markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Head of the Night Parade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2749) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 75</row>

</column>

---

You remember the revelry of the Night Parade and call them to your aid in a riotous display. You [Perform](/Actions.aspx?ID=59) and cast 8th-level [_mad monkeys_](/Spells.aspx?ID=702) three times, except that the spell calls various apparitions such as dancing [tsukumogami](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=272) or drinking [oni](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=144) rather than monkeys. Each casting can produce a different kind of mischief. You can Sustain all three Spells each round using a single Perform action.

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 75</row>

Player characters can select one of the following new class feats for their 20th-level class feat upon entering the _Glass Lighthouse_ or by meditating on the cushion in area H4.

**Related Feats**: [All the Time in the World](/Feats.aspx?ID=2744), [Dance of Intercession](/Feats.aspx?ID=2745), [Demon's Hair](/Feats.aspx?ID=2746), [Everdistant Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=2747), [Extradimensional Stash](/Feats.aspx?ID=2748), [Heart of the Kaiju](/Feats.aspx?ID=2750), [Plum Deluge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2751), [Ruby Resurrection](/Feats.aspx?ID=2752), [Scapegoat Parallel Self](/Feats.aspx?ID=2753), [Sever Space](/Feats.aspx?ID=2754), [Time Dilation Cascade](/Feats.aspx?ID=2755), [Vitality-Manipulating Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2756), [Vivacious Afterimage](/Feats.aspx?ID=2757), [Whirlwind Toss](/Feats.aspx?ID=2758), [Worldsphere Gravity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2759)
name: Head of the Night Parade
